articles.author: F1
articles.title: McLaren's right of review over Norris's Canadian GP penalty rejected by the stewards - Formula 1
articles.description: McLaren have been unsuccessful in their attempt to overturn the penalty handed out to Lando Norris in the Canadian Grand Prix, with the stewards rejecting their right of review request after meeting in Austria on Sunday morning.
articles.content:
Stewards have rejected McLaren's right of review request over Lando Norris's Canadian Grand Prix penalty after meeting in Austria on Sunday morning.
Norris was given a five-second penalty during the… [+1974 chars]
